backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features, related source files, components, and test IDs for build verification.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten one‑sentence summaries for all frontend source files used in the project.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and OKLCH-based color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML page loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/public/vendor/lame.min.js: Minified lamejs MP3 encoder library used for client-side audio encoding.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Renders ChatScreen as the app entry component.
frontend/src/features/chat/ChatScreen.ts: Main chat UI managing job history, URL/file input, and video-to-audio conversion flow.
frontend/src/features/chat/components/Ch: Input component handling URL/upload selection, format choice, validation, and triggering conversions.
Renders a list of conversion jobs with status indicators, progress, and metadata, or a placeholder when empty.
frontend/src/features/conversion/convert: Handles WAV and MP3 audio encoding from video by dynamically loading lamejs and converting AudioBuffers.
frontend/src/features/conversion/fetchVi: Fetches a video file from a URL with validation, CORS handling, and filename extraction.
frontend/src/features/conversion/useConv: Provides a React Query mutation hook to run video-to-audio conversions and return result metadata.
frontend/src/features/jobs/types.ts: Defines types for conversion job objects and status states.
frontend/src/features/jobs/useJobHistory: Maintains a local list of jobs with functions to add and update conversion job entries.
frontend/src/features/validation/urlVali: Validates and normalizes URLs using basic parsing rules.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes related queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context with login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file exporting nothing because backend has no callable methods.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS setup and custom theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/types/vendor-lame.d.ts: Type declarations for lamejs and its Mp3Encoder for TypeScript support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, including features, requirements, and metadata for a video-to-audio conversion app.
